channel.title: How do i add music to my client?
channel.description:
i really need help! i want to release my enw client but i want to make it have music before i do so. ive seen many tutorials and none of them have worked, ive always gotten some sort of error.
Edit: i just found this tutorial http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?13487-Adding-Music-and-sounds-to-a-317 it compiles fine, but it does not play the sound... please help!
